entry.title: Open Design Engine - Feature #24: Social networking sites support
entry.content:
• Estimated time set to 8.00

Thingyverse has something like this under "share" on individual thing pages. There is a facebook like plugin for Redmine which may be useful, but it looks very immature (v0.1.1). Could extend it to support other services (twitter, pinterest, reddit, g+?). For just basic functionality (implementation as just links to services' APIs) should be pretty easy. Going to aim at this first.
